item.description: Join Vested Interest in K9s for a tribute to law enforcement, Sunday, September 11th from 10:00a - 6:00p!..... (Rain date: Sunday, September 18, 2011)........ This will be an event like no other. A flag raising ceremony will be followed by a two hour scenic motorcycle ride, all you can eat BBQ, live entertainment provided by rock and roll cover band Sound Tower and Groove Juice featuring acoustic and electric performances, check out the latest custom motorcycles by Perewitz Cycle Fab, dunk your favorite police officer in the dunk tank, working dog demonstration, vendor marketplace, radio station Mix 104.1 Street Team, raffles and more....... $25 donation per person, which includes all you can eat BBQ and entertainment. More information www.vik9s.org or call 508-824-6978. Special appearance by the New England Patriots Cheerleaders 2:30-4:30pm....... All ticket sales final.
item.name: Hog Wild for K9s Charity Motorcycle Ride!
